ygData.subject: RE: A lower level Cleric speaks...
ygData.msgSnippet: From lvl 9 on I went to the mummy shrine in Lesser F. Great Experience until 14 or 15. Be careful at first what you pull. By standing in the right spot, use of
ygData.messageBody:
From lvl 9 on I went to the mummy shrine in Lesser F. Great Experience until
14 or 15. Be careful at first what you pull. By standing in the right spot,
use of root and ward you should be able pull and take yellows easily. Use
the wood elf camp as your base and you can run back and forth for safety.
Often there will be other clerics around that can pitch in if things get out
of hand. Be careful though as you are the lowest level where I would risk it
and even the orcs round there might beat you to a pulp.

Good luck

-----Original Message-----
From: Garza, Russell [mailto:r.garza@...]
Sent: Friday, September 24, 1999 3:39 PM
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] A lower level Cleric speaks...


From: "Garza, Russell" <r.garza@...>

Hello all,

I barely got lvl 9 last night (Woo Hoo!), and can't figure out any good
spots to hunt. It seems that everywhere I've been has a lot of greens and
yellows, or some blues hanging around with a bunch of yellows/reds.

Any advice on where a young cleric can get some experience. I'm tired of
running for the zone when those Legionnaires come to the aide of their cent
counterparts.

I'm sure you all remember getting 9th, but I don't know if you felt the
disappointment, that I did, in the spells that we got. I was all psyched to
get root and maybe soothe, but what else is there that works well? I'm
still using furor as my DD spell. Seems pretty weak compared to a 9th level
Druid's "ignite" spell that took a cent out in 2 casts. I can hit em 4 or 5
times with furor and still have to duke it out for a while. Any
encouragement out there?

Wixl
9th level Cleric
Bertoxxulous Server
